A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A few visually great sequences but overall cringeworthy edition to Star Wars. Badly used the characters and introduced too many new characters that have no real influence on the story. A couple of cringey jokes and lines that just ruined it a bit. Also think the camera was out of focus slightly on a shot of Mark Hamil. Not the greatest cinematography for a Star Wars film in all honesty. The best shots in the film were full VFX shots that probably had more direction from the VFX artist and supervisors (not the director/cinematographer!)
